DataElement.preferredDefinition: The act of judging the value, significance, or extent of something._Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._A condition or state at a particular time._Occurring in or belonging to the present time._Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity._Pertaining to or related to the blood and blood-forming organs._A means, manner of procedure, or systematic course of actions that have to be performed in order to accomplish a particular goal._Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._Clinical, laboratory or molecular evidence, or absence of evidence of disease._Text term to signify an affirmative response, negative response, or indication that an event did not occur.

Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. DataElementConcept.changeDescription: .11/8/12mn-Concept definition change in NCIt for 'Finding C3376' Was: Objective evidence of disease perceptible to the examining physician (sign) and subjective evidence of disease perceived by the patient (symptom). Now: Clinical, laboratory or molecular evidence, or absence of evidence of disease. no version change needed.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Text term to signify an affirmative response, negative response, or indication that an event did not occur.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ClassificationSchemes.longName: Artificial Neural Network Algorithm for BRIDG Mapping

ReferenceDocuments.name: Did the current clinical / he
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the current clinical / hematologic test used to assess the disease status detect disease?

ReferenceDocuments.name: BRIDG mapping for CDE:2770261
ReferenceDocuments.description: [IF EXISTS THEN "not evaluated"] PerformedObservation.negationIndicator = "true" WHERE PerformedObservation.methodCode = "hematologic" AND PerformedObservation > DefinedObservation.nameCode = "assess disease status" [ELSE IF EXISTS THEN "true"]  PerformedDiagnosis.diseaseStatus = "relapse" WHERE PerformedDiagnosis > AssessedResultRelationship > PerformedObservation.methodCode = "hematologic" AND PerformedObservation > DefinedObservation.nameCode = "assess disease status" [ELSE "false"]

DataElement.changeDescription: .11/8/12mn-Concept definition change in NCIt for 'Finding C3376' Was: Objective evidence of disease perceptible to the examining physician (sign) and subjective evidence of disease perceived by the patient (symptom). Now: Clinical, laboratory or molecular evidence, or absence of evidence of disease. no version change needed. .1/8/14mn-added Bridg info. removed alt names due to using CDE 2861259. AK 6/22/16
